PrismaticConstraint Class

Extends Constraint
Defined in: src/constraints/PrismaticConstraint.js:9

Constraint that only allows bodies to move along a line, relative to each other. See this tutorial.

Constructor

PrismaticConstraint

(
  • bodyA
  • bodyB
  • [options]
)

Defined in src/constraints/PrismaticConstraint.js:9

Parameters:

  • bodyA Body
  • bodyB Body
  • [options] Object optional
    • [maxForce] Number optional

      Max force to be applied by the constraint

    • [localAnchorA] Array optional

      Body A's anchor point, defined in its own local frame.

    • [localAnchorB] Array optional

      Body B's anchor point, defined in its own local frame.

    • [localAxisA] Array optional

      An axis, defined in body A frame, that body B's anchor point may slide along.

    • [disableRotationalLock] Boolean optional

      If set to true, bodyB will be free to rotate around its anchor point.

    • [upperLimit] Number optional
    • [lowerLimit] Number optional
  • Index
  • Methods
  • Properties

update

()

Inherited from Constraint but overwritten in src/constraints/PrismaticConstraint.js:204

Update the constraint equations. Should be done if any of the bodies changed position, before solving.

Properties

bodyA

Body

Inherited from Constraint: src/constraints/Constraint.js:28

First body participating in the constraint.

Body

Inherited from Constraint: src/constraints/Constraint.js:35

Second body participating in the constraint.

collideConnected

Boolean

Inherited from Constraint: src/constraints/Constraint.js:42

Set to true if you want the connected bodies to collide.

Default: true

Array

Inherited from Constraint: src/constraints/Constraint.js:20

Equations to be solved in this constraint

Array

Defined in src/constraints/PrismaticConstraint.js:51

lowerLimit

Number

Defined in src/constraints/PrismaticConstraint.js:136

Lower constraint limit. The constraint position is forced to be larger than this value.

lowerLimitEnabled

Boolean

Defined in src/constraints/PrismaticConstraint.js:122

Set to true to enable lower limit.

motorEnabled

Boolean

Defined in src/constraints/PrismaticConstraint.js:165

The current motor state. Enable or disable the motor using .enableMotor

motorEquation

Equation

Defined in src/constraints/PrismaticConstraint.js:158

Equation used for the motor.

motorSpeed

Number

Defined in src/constraints/PrismaticConstraint.js:172

Set the target speed for the motor.

position

Number

Defined in src/constraints/PrismaticConstraint.js:113

The position of anchor A relative to anchor B, along the constraint axis.

upperLimit

Number

Defined in src/constraints/PrismaticConstraint.js:143

Upper constraint limit. The constraint position is forced to be smaller than this value.

upperLimitEnabled

Boolean

Defined in src/constraints/PrismaticConstraint.js:129

Set to true to enable upper limit.
